document_data.mainbody:
King Emerus Warcrown was a shield dwarf fighter and ruler of Citadel Felbarr and one of the Members of the Council of 12 Peers.
Since 1367 DR, he sought to rebuild the "once-glorious city of Felbarr" despite this, the Citadel was still very vulnerable.
Emerus drew the runes on the doors and doorframe of the Rune Gate.
In the second month of the , King Emerus abdicated his throne and title to Parson Glaive to join the march to reclaim Gauntlgrym. Later that year, Emerus Warcrown died.
Emerus was a fit and muscular shield dwarf with flaxen beard and a scar from above the right eye, across his cheek, and ending at his right ear. He received the scar in the battle to recover Citadel Felbarr.
In 1463 DR, he was more than 200 years old but he had the sort of physique that would "make a fifty-year-old jealous."
